tooltip.dislocatormod.dislocator_block.t: Teleports you to a random place very far away
tooltip.dislocatormod.dislocator_block.c: You stepped on a dislocator block and were teleported far away! Craft a Return Stone to get back!
tooltip.dislocatormod.respawn_stone.tool: Returns you to your last respawnpoint. Dropped from phantoms
tooltip.dislocatormod.escape_rope.toolti: Lets you escape back to the overworld! Dropped from enderdragon
tooltip.dislocatormod.universal_respawna: Lets you set your respawn in any dimension. Cauption: Spawnpoint will still be there after removing the block until set somewhere else!
